name: ODIN
description: This game was made by Matteus Oosterlaken, Carson Bone, and Seth Sehon. We're excited the show the world our first ever contribution to the Indie Game Dev community. I myself had prior experience with unity, although limited, while Carson and Seth opened unity for the first time this weekend. We learned a lot and I cannot believe how well it turned out. We hope to bring out further updates to the game with a lot of quality of life changes. Thank you for reading and giving our game a play!
